name: The World Is Noise
description:
A GM48 entry, the theme is "Colour is important".

Rhythm-based nuclear-throne-like prototype. Green enemy -> shoot with green gun and so on. HP will be restored in each new room. Short game (~15 min), it will just end when you go into the last room. Enjoy!

P.S. Didn't really finished it in time, so I needed another ~6 hours to maked it done after the jams' end. I wanted to implement shaders, slow-mo, bosses, but I stopped it right there so it will stay as prototype and not as demo.
